Title: Community Growth Target
Description: Target community size before next funding round. Community engagement serves as social proof and indicates market fit. Discussed whether 5000 or 10000 is the right threshold for active users.
Notes: Clear mutual agreement - Alice said 'I love that target'

Title: Spend vs Sustainability
Description: How aggressively to spend on growth vs controlling costs. Tension between rapid expansion mentality and sustainable unit economics. Discussed cloud infrastructure costs and API expenses.
Notes: Debated 4+ times without resolution. Topic was 'parked' but kept resurfacing.

Title: Anonymous Access Tier
Description: Whether to offer value without requiring user accounts. Trade-off between reducing friction and collecting usage data. Similar products succeeded without mandatory login.
Notes: Alice pushed back wanting login earlier. Eventually conceded but with reservations.

Title: Client Cache Architecture
Description: Whether client-side cache should be a simple proxy cache (exact copies of server responses) or a condensed/personalized version. Discussed 15+ minutes with terminology confusion.
Decision: Proxy cache model (client requests cached locally)
Notes: Bob said 'I'm confused' multiple times. Team may have different mental models.

Title: Rules vs Recommendations
Description: Terminology distinction: rules are testable/enforceable constraints; recommendations are matters of taste and judgment. Affects how documentation is structured.
